name: Underling Worker Union
description:
(Godot v.3.2.1)

A fire-slinging, shinies-loving imp. A cheerful, vegetarian slime (the bone was a gift). And the skeleton of a drag queen. What do they all have in common?

They're members of UWU - the Underling Worker Union - and they're on a quest to protest the invasion of the dungeon they call home. Their journey will take them into human territory, where they seek to present their case to the King himself.

---

Keyboard/Mouse Controls:

A/D - Left/Right
Shift - Sprint
Space - Jump
W - Swap Characters
Left Click - Attack
Right Click - Revive (Costs 1 Coin)

Joypad Controls:
Left Thumbstick - Move
D-Pad Up - Switch
Cross - Jump
Square - Sprint
Circle - Attack
Triangle - Revive

---

Special Features:

Sloom the Slime: Can be Hit Twice Before Death & Slime through Grates
Seraphina the Skeleton: Uses Arcing Bow Shots
Oomp the Imp: Triple Jump and Barrier Breaks (Forward + Attack)

Four Unique Endings!

---

Thank you to everyone who supported us during our first ever Game Jam (and first ever released game)! All sprites were done by my wonderfully talented wife, Kaizavair. Thank you to Evan for all your advice banging out the bugs of code while I learned Godot! Enjoy guys! Toodaloo! :D
